General.Name: GuangYuYuan Chinese Herbal Medicine Co Ltd
General.Description: GuangYuYuan Chinese Herbal Medicine Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells Chinese medicinal products. The company offers traditional and fine Chinese medicines, as well as health wines. It provides its products in the form of pills, powders, tablets, hard capsules, granules, oral liquids, decoctions, and wines. The company was formerly known as Topsun Science And Technology Co Ltd. and changed its name to GuangYuYuan Chinese Herbal Medicine Co., Ltd. in July 2013. GuangYuYuan Chinese Herbal Medicine Co., Ltd. is based in Xi'an, China.
